Thanks to my wife Julie and my kids for their love and support. And for always being there for me. #utpol #utdebates https://t.co/PlyxgWLzGQ

I work hard to represent everyone. You may not agree with every decision I make. You know my heart is in the right place. I listen. I work to bring people together and find solutions. #utpol #utdebates

Teamed up w/GOP members to advance solar energy technology tackle ozone pollution harness private sector innovation to combat pollution  address climate issues protect Utah's beautiful natural lands.#utpol #utdebates

My opponent has made past decisions such as harmful changes to Social Security denying coverage to those with pre-existing conditions. That's troubling and voters deserve to know who wants to represent them. #utpol #utdebates

Seeing an uptick in virus infections harming families and Utah's economy. It's time to rally together to assist Utahns urban and rural. The virus doesn't care where you live. Most important issue now. #utpol #utdebates
Read about my bill passage here: https://t.co/IGGYxHfejj
Proud of my track record in Congress to pass legislation to protect kids from online predators stand up to tech companies who must do more to help parents protect their kids. #utpol #utdebates

Must protect our kids. I passed STIFLE Act to work with private sector to identify disrupt 'dark markets' financing trafficking. Proud to stand with Granite School Dist. recently to work together to protect children. #utpol #utdebates
Clear distinction here. We are all Americans. To heal what is broken in Washington we need people who recognize we have more in common than what divides us. #utpol #utdebates

At a time when our country is so divided words matter. Stop name-calling stop the finger-pointing. I meet w/Problem Solvers - Republicans Democrats who believe there are good ideas in both parties. #utpol #utdebates

People are afraid the repeal of the ACA will take away their coverage. My opponent's website called for repeal until we started talking about how much harm that would do to Utahns.  Was in black and white on his website. What's true is true. #utpol #utdebates

My sister is a Type 1 diabetic. Our family worried constantly about insulin costs. Patients should never have to ration insulin. I'll protect coverage for those with pre-existing conditions lower costs. My opponent called for repeal of the ACA on his website. #utpol #utdebates
Progress starts with listening. People tell me doors remain closed to them.I want to contribute and get to the time when every American feels respected valued. #utpol #utdebates

We have come so far as a country to ensure equality under the law. Events of the summer show people felt left behind treated unfairly. Must rise up be better make our neighbor feel respected. Heal the divide. #utpol #utdebates

Can't let gridlock prevent additional help. We need a smart plan to slow spread of the virus and deliver help to families small businesses. Need to stabilize the economy today knowing we have to pay it back tomorrow. All sides need to negotiate compromise. #utpol #2020debate
Talked with Dave at Pat's BBQ. His small business is nowhere near back to the profitability it had. Utahns are struggling and unemployment is too high. #utpol #2020debate

Initially Congress came together in a bipartisan way extended lifelines to individuals and small businesses. But since then partisanship returned. I've called on both sides to come together on the next COVID-19 relief package. #utpol #2020debate
Raised in a family of 8 on values of faith family duty to community. Growing up my family struggled to make ends meet. Grateful for blessings I have today. #2020debate #utpol
